books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A father recounts his 3-year-old son’s encounter with Jesus and the angels during an appendectomy.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL

books.author: by Tina Fey
books.description: A memoir from the former Saturday Night Live star and creator of “30 Rock.”
books.name: BOSSYPANTS

books.author: by Rob Lowe
books.description: The actor charts his professional path, from teen idol to “The West Wing.”
books.name: STORIES I ONLY TELL MY FRIENDS

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Rebecca Skloot
books.description: The story of a woman whose cancer cells were extensively cultured without her permission in 1951.
books.name: THE IMMORTAL LIFE OF HENRIETTA LACKS

books.author: by David Brooks
books.description: Brooks creates two imaginary people, Harold and Erica, to illustrate his understanding of the human mind, the wellsprings of action and the causes of success and failure.
books.name: THE SOCIAL ANIMAL

books.author: by Diana B. Henriques
books.description: A New York Times financial writer details the story of Bernard Madoff, from his rise on Wall Street to his conviction for creating a $65 billion Ponzi scheme.
books.name: THE WIZARD OF LIES

books.author: by Ashley Judd with Maryanne Vollers
books.description: A memoir by the actress and humanitarian.
books.name: ALL THAT IS BITTER AND SWEET

books.author: by Ron Paul
books.description: The Texas congressman examines 50 controversial issues.
books.name: LIBERTY DEFINED

books.author: by Howard Schultz with Joanne Gordon
books.description: Schultz tells of his second stint as the C.E.O. of Starbucks and how he helped return the company to profitability.
books.name: ONWARD

books.author: by Christopher McDougall
books.description: Secrets of distance running from a Mexican Indian tribe.
books.name: BORN TO RUN

books.author: by Darell Hammond
books.description: Hammond describes how he created Kaboom, a nonprofit that provides communities with the resources to build playgrounds.
books.name: KABOOM!

books.author: by Shirley MacLaine
books.description: The actress offers observations on what remains important to her.
books.name: I'M OVER ALL THAT

books.author: by Siddhartha Mukherjee
books.description: An oncologist’s history of cancer and its treatment covers both the eureka moments and the decades of despair.
books.name: THE EMPEROR OF ALL MALADIES

books.author: by Adam Goodheart
books.description: A historian examines the months between Lincoln’s election in 1860 and July 4, 1861, when he delivered his first message to Congress.
